title: Serious Ranked 5's Team Looking for Dedicated Top Laner: Also Looking for a Coach
body:
**(At the moment, I want divisions Gold and above, but I will accept applicants Silver 2 and up if they prove themselves.)**

**Information: **
Hello, I’m Jared (DarkCloud360) and I’m attempting to put together a winning team. I had a previous team, but due to disputes involving schedules two members have parted ways leaving us to fill their spots. We have filled one spot but are still on the lookout for a Top Laner.

**About the Team** 
I started a team last November and being new to team building I lacked a strict practice schedule. I worked with the members of my team set up certain times for us to practice together and build together and learn how we all synergize. This team did fine for a few weeks, but later our synergy fell apart making me have to get rid of two of the starters and moving my old Top Laner to the current jungle. My personal goal is to unify a hard working team that can be confident enough to try out for NACS. Im hoping that I will find the perfect fit and complete my rooster.

**What is expected from Top Lane:**
We want you to play Meta picks like:{{champion:150}} {{champion:39}}{{champion:14}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:127}}{{champion:68}}  , but you can have pocket picks like: {{champion:84}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:268}}{{champion:58}} {{champion:421}}      . We are looking for a person that is confident in their position and knows how to handle themselves in tough situations as well as cooperate and talk with fellow team members. We would like someone who enjoys the top lane and does not want to switch positions since top lane is the only one we are looking to fill at the moment. We like to joke and have fun while playing and would love if you were funny and have a sense of humor to help the team communicate and stay close to work as best together as we can. I know these are a lot, but if you meet these prerequisites we would love for you to tryout. 

**Also comment down below/tell me in game:**
What are your strengths:
What are your weaknesses:
What your champion pool is
Why you are interested in Ranked 5's:
Will you be dedicated to a Team:
What you can bring to a Team:

**Practice Times and Voice Comms**
The schedule for practice is: Monday-Friday: 8pm-12am EST. Saturday and Sunday we will play if everyone is on for a few hours, but we may have a tournament on Saturdays also. Currently our schedule reflects when our Jungler gets home. He is getting his schedule fixed next week so until then we will start around 9/10.

***Skype is required***

**Tryouts**
If  you  are alright with the practice times and Voice comms listed above then you are ready for tryouts.I really am looking for anyone that is serious about learning from their mistakes, and looking to improve a lot together as a team. This job can't be done single-handedly so we all must work together. With tryouts, we will play several games together just so we can grasp your play-style and your personality. After the first two or so games we play we will play with voice comms, and see how your communication with the team is.

**Closing **
I really hope to hear from anyone that can fit in with these practice times. Thank you for reading this long post. I just want to make sure I gave you a feel for what our team is looking for and what we expect from a potential Top Laner. Thank you!

**(Also add me if you are interested, tell me the role you are applying for and your champ pool for said role.)**

replies.body:
What are you strengths: Lane bullying (win lane most of the time), warding and deep warding, teamplay, objective control (especially dragons).
What are your weaknesses: I can tunnel vision hard sometimes, rumble ults, over extending just a bit (especially on tanks and when i'm ahead), and starting fights that probably shouldn't be started
What your champion pool is: Top: Gnar, Maokai, Sion, Lissandra, I can also play Rumble just not extremely good with ults, Lulu, Mundo, Gragas, J4
Why are you interested in Ranked 5's: I'm a much better player when I play with friends vs playing with strangers. Plus, I want to get better at the game and be able to enjoy the competitive side with other people are competitive like I am.
Will you be dedicated to the team: Yes but I'm currently enrolled in college and with groups like the marching band and choir so there may be conflicts, and I have a girlfriend but besides those things I will be 100% dedicated to the team
What you can bring to the team: Willingness to try anything the team needs of me, desire to get to the top and be the best team player I can be and hopefully make the team as a whole the best it can be.

I know you are asking for Gold or above but I finished in Silver 1 at the end of last season and haven't played much ranked as of schoolwork and only able to get in a couple of games a day and switching roles. If you have any questions or want to see me play, add me or message me.

What are your strengths: Lane control, aggression in the lane, map awareness as I used to jungle excessively, (except around my own lane xD), initiations, zoning. playing for the team (diving/tanking/doing all I can to die so a carry can live)
What are your weaknesses: Awareness sometimes while laning, playing from behind, calling for barons at improper moments
What your champion pool is: Gnar, Irelia, Lee Sin, Wukong, Pantheon, Maoki, Nidalee, Jarvan, and I have dabbled in every champion I own, however I am not responsible with all of them
Why you are interested in Ranked 5's: Want to learn more about the game, want to perfect the game, don't play physical sports anymore and I miss a team environment, want to see how far I can progress and help the team
Will you be dedicated to a Team: Yes. 
What you can bring to a Team: A wide variety of champions i'm willing to learn apart from the ones I already feel confident on, activity on the game and off if necessary to learn, dedication, desire to progress through the game

What are you looking for in terms of the coaching position?  Was placed platinum last season before taking a rather long hiatus from the game.  Might be interested in working with the team.  Contact me at tandrionos2@gmail.com if you want to talk but I'll save the link to this post just in case.

i would be interested in coaching i'm g3 peaked at g1 plat promos. I watch the pro scene very knowledgeable.

What are your strengths: Agressiveness, Mapawareness, warding, Knowing how to use teleport correctly, I am very devoted to the game.

What are your weaknesses: Sometimes i get a little too agressive. I can be a little shy when it comes to Ts or skyping but it is fine i say what needs to be said 
What your champion pool is: Irelia, Mundo, Rumble, Riven, Gnar LIssandra, Renekton
Why you are interested in Ranked 5's: I want to climb with a group and i have alot of ingame knowledge as i have been playing since season2 i feel like i could really benifit a team
Will you be dedicated to a Team:YES
What you can bring to a Team:Knowledge, Funny guy, Calmness, and just an all around good time

What are your strengths: Push lane/Split Push/Meta Champs
What are your weaknesses: Tp in alittle late
What your champion pool is: Rumble/Renekton/Riven/Malphite/Jax/Liss/Gnar/Moak/Irelia
Why you are interested in Ranked 5's: I like competition/I like teamwork/I like to improve
Will you be dedicated to a Team: of course
What you can bring to a Team: High CS numbers/High control on lane and team fights

Come join Vigorous Gaming and we can work a partnership and help advertise your team? we are a competitive LoL community with tournaments on weekends and scrims/practice on weekdays, we'll create your own 5v5s team setup under our own Ts3 channel group and bring your team mates also. We'll also create ur own team roster on our website with a nice gfx banner with your Team name/Roster.

If interested contact me on Ts3, VG website or reply back here.

Come check us out! :D

Ts3 ip - virgorousgaming.teampseak3.com:3526

Vigorous Gaming website - www.vigorousgaming.esportsify.com

Free coaching is available on all roles with us.

Peace.

come join our teamspeak and i can provide more info verbally if you'd like.

What are your strengths: Great Game Knowledge, vision control and dragon control bottom, I have a great pool in all lanes, expect for mid, but main Bot/Jungle Primarly and secondardy top laner.
What are your weaknesses: Aggressive game style, require peel and back up to preform well.
What your champion pool is 
Jungle:{{champion:254}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:20}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:107}} 
Support:{{champion:201}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:12}} 
ADC: Meta's.
Why you are interested in Ranked 5's: So i can improve before i play more games in plat 1
so i can reach high diamond without ruining my  soloq mmr.
Will you be dedicated to a Team: yea
What you can bring to a Team: Try me out.

What are your strengths: I can play alot of champs/ roles (have mained it all at one point)
What are your weaknesses: I can sometimes get lost in csing and bullying, and lose map awareness. 
What your champion pool is: Anything you want.
Why you are interested in Ranked 5's: None of my friends want to play it consistently
Will you be dedicated to a Team: Yes, but if IRL things come up, i take priority to them.
What you can bring to a Team: Milk and cookies? Nah, i usually get along pretty well with alot of people. I can adapt to alot of things
Is there a certain rank needed? It says somthing about NACS, so im guessing high diamond or challenger?

What are your strengths: Team fighting, pressuring objectives, deep wards, wards.

What are your weaknesses: Map awareness, sometimes would be too focused on farming or killing or pressuring, can be toxic if I'm in a bad mood

What your champion pool is: Rumble, Nasus, Vladimir, Irelia, Malphite, Lissandra, Gnar
(I know every top laner in the book, except teemo, I hate that little bastard I refuse to even buy him)

Why you are interested in Ranked 5's: Having fun, tournaments, testing my strengths, improving my behavior

Will you be dedicated to a Team: Yes, but only to an extent, as I have real life activities, I have to limit certain stuff.

What you can bring to a Team: A lot of pain, a lot of killing, more importantly, a lot of wins.
